text: The Sclerotiniaceae are a family of fungi in the order Helotiales. Many species in this family are plant pathogens. == Genera == * Asterocalyx * Botryotinia * Botrytis * Ciboria * Ciborinia * Coprotinia * Cudoniopsis * Dicephalospora * Dumontinia * Elliottinia * Encoelia * Grovesinia * Kohninia * Lambertellina * Martininia * Mitrula * Mitrulinia * Monilinia * Moserella (placement uncertain) * Myriosclerotinia * Ovulinia * Phaeosclerotinia * Poculina * Pseudociboria * Pycnopeziza * Redheadia * Sclerocrana * Sclerotinia * Seaverinia * Septotinia * Streptotinia * Stromatinia * Torrendiella * Valdensinia * Zoellneria == References == Category:Helotiales Category:Ascomycota families
title: Sclerotiniaceae
